entries.en-US: This is an example project-level CLAUDE.md file. Place this in your project root.
entries.zh-Hans: 这是一个示例项目级别的 CLAUDE.md 文件。请将其放置在您的项目根目录下。

entries.en-US: [Brief description of your project - what it does, tech stack]
entries.zh-Hans: \[项目简要描述 - 功能、技术栈]

entries.en-US:
- Many small files over few large files
- High cohesion, low coupling
- 200-400 lines typical, 800 max per file
- Organize by feature/domain, not by type
entries.zh-Hans:
* 多个小文件优于少量大文件
* 高内聚，低耦合
* 每个文件典型 200-400 行，最多 800 行
* 按功能/领域组织，而非按类型

entries.en-US:
- No emojis in code, comments, or documentation
- Immutability always - never mutate objects or arrays
- No console.log in production code
- Proper error handling with try/catch
- Input validation with Zod or similar
entries.zh-Hans:
* 代码、注释或文档中不使用表情符号
* 始终使用不可变性 - 永不改变对象或数组
* 生产代码中不使用 console.log
* 使用 try/catch 进行适当的错误处理
* 使用 Zod 或类似工具进行输入验证

entries.en-US:
- TDD: Write tests first
- 80% minimum coverage
- Unit tests for utilities
- Integration tests for APIs
- E2E tests for critical flows
entries.zh-Hans:
* TDD：先写测试
* 最低 80% 覆盖率
* 工具函数进行单元测试
* API 进行集成测试
* 关键流程进行端到端测试

entries.en-US:
- No hardcoded secrets
- Environment variables for sensitive data
- Validate all user inputs
- Parameterized queries only
- CSRF protection enabled
entries.zh-Hans:
* 不硬编码密钥
* 敏感数据使用环境变量
* 验证所有用户输入
* 仅使用参数化查询
* 启用 CSRF 保护

entries.en-US:
```
src/
|-- app/              # Next.js app router
|-- components/       # Reusable UI components
|-- hooks/            # Custom React hooks
|-- lib/              # Utility libraries
|-- types/            # TypeScript definitions
```
entries.zh-Hans:
```
src/
|-- app/              # Next.js app router
|-- components/       # Reusable UI components
|-- hooks/            # Custom React hooks
|-- lib/              # Utility libraries
|-- types/            # TypeScript definitions
```

entries.en-US:
```typescript
interface ApiResponse<T> {
  success: boolean
  data?: T
  error?: string
}
```
entries.zh-Hans:
```typescript
interface ApiResponse<T> {
  success: boolean
  data?: T
  error?: string
}
```

entries.en-US:
- `/tdd` - Test-driven development workflow
- `/plan` - Create implementation plan
- `/code-review` - Review code quality
- `/build-fix` - Fix build errors
entries.zh-Hans:
* `/tdd` - 测试驱动开发工作流
* `/plan` - 创建实现计划
* `/code-review` - 审查代码质量
* `/build-fix` - 修复构建错误

entries.en-US:
- Conventional commits: `feat:`, `fix:`, `refactor:`, `docs:`, `test:`
- Never commit to main directly
- PRs require review
- All tests must pass before merge
entries.zh-Hans:
* 约定式提交：`feat:`, `fix:`, `refactor:`, `docs:`, `test:`
* 切勿直接提交到主分支
* 合并请求需要审核
* 合并前所有测试必须通过
